mapper.select: select f.firmware_id, f.firmware_name, f.product_id, f.product_name, f.is_sys, f.is_latest, f.version, f.file_path, f.create_time, f.remark from iot_device d left join iot_firmware f on d.product_id = f.product_id where d.device_id = #{deviceId} and f.is_latest = 1 order by f.create_time desc limit 1
